content.rendered:
DIONNE LOVES TOUCHLAND HAND SANITIZERS!

Times have changed and in 2020 we realized how important it is to stay healthy and have clean hands on the go. 

My absolute favorite product for 2021 is touchland hand sanitizers for both on the go mist sprays and a large touchland dispenser at my office/studio.

Touchland is very hydrating, fast-absorbing, non-sticky, and lightly scented hand sanitizer mists. I personally love the blue one to match my D’Lashes colors 😉 and I also love the watermelon scented hand spray.

These hand sanitizers help keep your hands super clean and are cruelty-free and vegan. The packaging is also just beautiful with a clean modern design. They also come in different colors and many different scents.

Touchland hand sanitizers also make perfect gifts for family and friends. I’m offering a special 10% discount when you shop at touchland.com! Just enter DLashes10 as your promo code during checkout. Click to shop touchland.com.

P.S. Shop D’Lashes Beauty, Your One on One Live Lash Session, Candles, and A-List Strip Lashes Here. 

Wishing you all tons of love, health, and hapiness!
